Title: Viva Erotica
Writer: Bosco Lam, Chi-Leung Law, Tung-Shing Yee
Actors: Leslie Cheung, Karen Mok, Qi Shu, Ching Wan Lau
Plot: A struggling director is offered the opportunity to direct a Cat-III film to revive his career. Torn between artistic integrity and financial troubles, he also has to deal with his jealous girlfriend and a demanding actress, all while keeping his gangster financiers happy.
